testcase.name: should show unread count indicator when there are unread notifications
should show badge when unread count is greater than 3
should show 99+ when unread count exceeds 99
should not show badge when unread count is 3 or less
should open notification panel when clicked
should pass correct locale to notification panel
should handle mark as read action
should handle mark all as read action
should handle API response without success flag
should set up interval for periodic updates

testcase.classname: NotificationButton Component › unread count display logic
testcase.name: should not show anything when count is 0

testcase.classname: NotificationButton Component › unread count display logic
testcase.name: should show only indicator dot for count 1-3

testcase.classname: NotificationButton Component › unread count display logic
testcase.name: should show both indicator and badge for count > 3
